resources.string: A sexy, secure, open-source, standalone two-factor authentication client for watches.
To import secrets from Bitwarden, export an unencrypted Bitwarden JSON file and place it in the following directory:
Export your accounts and take a picture of the QR code. Make sure it is a JPG/PNG image and place it in the following directory:
Take a picture of a QR code, make sure it is a JPG/PNG image and place it in the following directory:
To import secrets from Aegis Authenticator, export an unencrypted Aegis JSON file and place it in the following directory:
To import secrets from andOTP, export an unencrypted andOTP JSON file and place it in the following directory:
To import secrets from an old backup, place your WFS file in the following directory:
You can use the file picker, ADB or a file transfer app for this.
